description: Comprehensive analytics dashboard for n8n workflow automation platform. Monitor workflow execution performance, track success rates, identify bottlenecks, and optimize your automation workflows.

panels.description: Total number of workflows in the system

targets.rawSql: SELECT COUNT(*) AS value FROM workflow_entity;

panels.title: Total workflows

targets.rawSql: SELECT COUNT(*) AS value FROM workflow_entity WHERE active = true;

panels.description: Total execution count in selected time range

targets.rawSql: SELECT COUNT(*) AS value FROM execution_entity WHERE $__timeFilter("startedAt");

panels.title: Total executions

panels.description: Percentage of successful executions in time range

targets.rawSql: SELECT ROUND(100.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN status = 'success' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0), 2) AS value FROM execution_entity WHERE $__timeFilter("startedAt");

panels.title: Success rate

panels.description: Number of failed executions (error or crashed) in time range

targets.rawSql: SELECT COUNT(*) AS value FROM execution_entity WHERE status IN ('error', 'crashed') AND $__timeFilter("startedAt");

panels.title: Failed executions

targets.rawSql:
SELECT COUNT(*) AS value
FROM execution_entity
WHERE finished = false
  AND "stoppedAt" IS NULL
  AND "startedAt" IS NOT NULL;

panels.description: P95, Maximum, Average, and Median execution duration in the last 24 hours

targets.rawSql: SELECT percentile_cont(0.95) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY EXTRACT(epoch FROM ("stoppedAt" - "startedAt"))) AS "P95 duration (24h)" FROM execution_entity WHERE "startedAt" >= NOW() - INTERVAL '24 hours' AND "stoppedAt" IS NOT NULL;
SELECT MAX(EXTRACT(epoch FROM ("stoppedAt" - "startedAt"))) AS "Max duration (24h)" FROM execution_entity WHERE "startedAt" >= NOW() - INTERVAL '24 hours' AND "stoppedAt" IS NOT NULL;
SELECT AVG(EXTRACT(epoch FROM ("stoppedAt" - "startedAt"))) AS "Avg duration (24h)" FROM execution_entity WHERE "startedAt" >= NOW() - INTERVAL '24 hours' AND "stoppedAt" IS NOT NULL;

SELECT percentile_cont(0.50) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY EXTRACT(epoch FROM ("stoppedAt" - "startedAt"))) AS "Median duration (24h)" FROM execution_entity WHERE "startedAt" >= NOW() - INTERVAL '24 hours' AND "stoppedAt" IS NOT NULL;

panels.title: P95, Max, Avg & Median duration (24h)

panels.description: Execution counts over time by status (success, error, crashed)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias("startedAt", '1h'),
  COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE "status" = 'success') AS success,
  COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE "status" = 'error') AS error,
  COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE "status" = 'crashed') AS crashed
FROM execution_entity
WHERE $__timeFilter("startedAt")
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1;

panels.title: Executions over time by status

panels.description: Execution duration percentiles over time (P50, P95, P99)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias("startedAt", '1h'),
  percentile_cont(0.50) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY EXTRACT(epoch FROM ("stoppedAt" - "startedAt"))) AS p50,
  percentile_cont(0.95) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY EXTRACT(epoch FROM ("stoppedAt" - "startedAt"))) AS p95,
  percentile_cont(0.99) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY EXTRACT(epoch FROM ("stoppedAt" - "startedAt"))) AS p99
FROM execution_entity
WHERE $__timeFilter("startedAt")
  AND "stoppedAt" IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1;

panels.title: Execution duration percentiles

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  w."name" AS workflow_name,
  w."active",
  COUNT(*) AS executions,
  ROUND(100.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN e."status" = 'success' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0), 2) AS success_rate,
  MAX(e."startedAt") AS last_execution
FROM execution_entity e
JOIN workflow_entity w ON e."workflowId" = w."id"
WHERE $__timeFilter(e."startedAt")
GROUP BY e."workflowId", w."name", w."active"
ORDER BY executions DESC
LIMIT 10;

SELECT
  DATE_TRUNC('day', "startedAt") AS time,
  ROUND(100.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN status = 'success' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0), 2) AS success_rate
FROM execution_entity
WHERE $__timeFilter("startedAt")
  AND status IN ('success', 'error', 'crashed')
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1;

panels.description: Execution queue depth over time showing queued and running executions

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias("startedAt", '1h'),
  COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE "finished" = false AND "status" = 'new') AS queued,
  COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE "finished" = false AND "status" != 'new') AS running
FROM execution_entity
WHERE $__timeFilter("startedAt")
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1;

panels.title: Execution queue depth

panels.description: Top 10 slowest workflows by average duration

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  w."name" AS workflow_name,
  ROUND(AVG(EXTRACT(epoch FROM (e."stoppedAt" - e."startedAt")))::numeric, 2) AS avg_duration_seconds,
  ROUND(MAX(EXTRACT(epoch FROM (e."stoppedAt" - e."startedAt")))::numeric, 2) AS max_duration_seconds,
  COUNT(*) AS executions_count
FROM execution_entity e
LEFT JOIN workflow_entity w ON w."id" = e."workflowId"
WHERE $__timeFilter(e."startedAt")
  AND e."stoppedAt" IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY e."workflowId", w."name"
ORDER BY avg_duration_seconds DESC
LIMIT 10;

panels.title: Slowest workflows (by avg duration)

panels.description: Top 10 workflows with the most failures

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  w."name" AS workflow_name,
  COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE e."status" IN ('error', 'crashed')) AS failures,
  COUNT(*) AS total_executions,
  ROUND(100.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN e."status" IN ('error', 'crashed') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0), 2) AS failure_rate_pct,
  MAX(e."startedAt") AS last_failure
FROM execution_entity e
LEFT JOIN workflow_entity w ON w."id" = e."workflowId"
WHERE $__timeFilter(e."startedAt")
GROUP BY e."workflowId", w."name"
HAVING COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE e."status" IN ('error', 'crashed')) > 0
ORDER BY failures DESC
LIMIT 10;

panels.title: Workflows with most failures

panels.description: Workflows with recent updates or activation changes

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  "name" AS workflow_name,
  "active",
  "updatedAt",
  "createdAt"
FROM workflow_entity
ORDER BY "updatedAt" DESC
LIMIT 20;

panels.title: Recently updated workflows

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  w."name" AS workflow_name,
  STRING_AGG(t."name", ', ') AS tags,
  w."active",
  w."updatedAt"
FROM workflow_entity w
LEFT JOIN workflows_tags wt ON wt."workflowId" = w."id"
LEFT JOIN tag_entity t ON t."id" = wt."tagId"
GROUP BY w."id", w."name", w."active", w."updatedAt"
HAVING COUNT(t."id") > 0
ORDER BY w."updatedAt" DESC;

panels.description: Current execution queue with pending workflows

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  e."id" AS execution_id,
  w."name" AS workflow_name,
  e."mode",
  e."status",
  e."startedAt",
  EXTRACT(epoch FROM (NOW() - e."startedAt")) * 1000 AS wait_time
FROM execution_entity e
LEFT JOIN workflow_entity w ON w."id" = e."workflowId"
WHERE e."finished" = false
  AND e."status" = 'new'
ORDER BY e."startedAt" ASC
LIMIT 20;

panels.title: Current execution queue (pending)

panels.description: Long running executions that may be stuck

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
    e."id" AS execution_id,
    w."name" AS workflow_name,
    e."mode",
    e."status",
    e."startedAt",
    e."stoppedAt",
    ROUND(
        EXTRACT(
            epoch FROM 
            (COALESCE(e."stoppedAt", NOW()) - e."startedAt")
        ), 2
    ) AS runtime_seconds,
    CASE
        WHEN e."stoppedAt" IS NULL THEN 'yes'
        ELSE 'no'
    END AS running
FROM execution_entity e
LEFT JOIN workflow_entity w ON w."id" = e."workflowId"
ORDER BY runtime_seconds DESC
LIMIT 20;

panels.title: Long running executions

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  e."id" AS execution_id,
  w."name" AS workflow_name,
  e."status",
  e."mode",
  e."startedAt",
  e."stoppedAt",
  CASE 
    WHEN e."stoppedAt" IS NOT NULL THEN EXTRACT(epoch FROM (e."stoppedAt" - e."startedAt"))
    ELSE NULL
  END AS duration_seconds
FROM execution_entity e
LEFT JOIN workflow_entity w ON w."id" = e."workflowId"
WHERE e."status" IN ('error', 'crashed')
  AND $__timeFilter(e."startedAt")
ORDER BY e."startedAt" DESC
LIMIT 50;

title: n8n Workflow & Execution Analytics
